input: Subject: A tranquil seaside pier; Characteristics: wooden planks extending into the water; Timing and lighting: sunset with pastel colors; Background: calm ocean and distant horizon; Feeling: peaceful and reflective.
coverage: A tranquil seaside pier made of wooden planks extending gracefully into calm waters, set against a sunset sky painted with soft pastel colors. The warm, gentle light of the fading sun reflects on the serene ocean and stretches towards a distant horizon. The peaceful scene captures a reflective atmosphere, highlighting the quiet beauty of the pier within the soothing natural environment.
